DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determinate if the patients submitted to laparoscopic surgery in trendelemburg position develope more inadequate anaesthesic emergence than patients submitted to laparoscopic surgery in other positions.
DOC.brief_title: Inadequate Emergence After Laparoscopic Surgery in Trendelemburg Position
DOC.criteria: laparoscopic surgery general anaesthesia trendelemburg positioning extubated in the operatory theater unable of communicate dementia psychiatric history neurosurgery alchohol and drugs addictions
